author: gartung
body:
These workflows will be used for profiling. The requirement is that they be in the default set of relvals run so that no special category is needed to find them, i.e. upgrade, 2026, etc.

The workflows will be set per release number in 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/2686
title: Configuration/PyReleaseValidation: Add 18634.21 to relval_2017.py which is loaded by default
